author: AndreaBellora
body:
#### PR description:

This is a technical PR aimed at removing two unused variables as pointed out in PR #28726

#### PR validation:

Running

`runTheMatrix.py -l limited --ibeos`

gave

`34 33 32 26 16 4 1 1 1 tests passed, 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed`
title: Removing unused variables from "CTPPSPixelDQMSource.cc" - fix suggested in PR #28726
